availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John C. Whitlock (Christian County, Kentucky, physician)

body.p: Christian County, Kentucky, physician. Virginia native. Son of John Whitlock and Sarah Ashlin Whitlock. Married to Maria F. Withrow Whitlock on January 13, 1848. Father of John A. Whitlock, Lucy W. Whitlock, and Kate E. Whitlock. Studied medicine under John A. Steele. Member of the House of Representative of the State of Kentucky in 1846. Graduate of the University of Louisville Medical School in 1852. Physician in Christian County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Christian County, p. 19.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Pendleton County Marriages, Film #001942963, p. 134-35.
Find A Grave, "John C. Whitlock (March 18, 1818-November 7, 1886)," Memorial #100924402, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/100924402 (accessed September 20, 2018).
William Henry Perrin, County of Christian, Kentucky, Historical and Biographical (Chicago: F. A. Battey Publishing Co., 1884).
